entry.title: [SBG5][Private/Public Network] - SBG0506A01D
entry.content:
Jul 10, 17:38 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 10/07/2023 16:14 UTC
End time : 10/07/2023 17:34 UTC
Service status: The situation is back to normal, the service is running nominally.
Root cause : It was due to a malfunction on a power suply.

Jul 10, 16:40 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Jul 10, 16:25 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 10/07/2023 16:14 UTC
Service impact : All servers are unreachable on this rack
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.
